snippet: Home sales in Lima have been slow for the last year, with the higher end of the market particularly sluggish, agents say....
abstract: International House Hunting column; Mediterranean-style home located on hill in Santiago de Surco district of Lima, Peru, is listed at $4.5 million; information about market and tips for buying properties in Lima highlighted.
lead_paragraph: Home sales in Lima have been slow for the last year, with the higher end of the market particularly sluggish, agents say.
